Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the participation by free association libraries in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes the participation by free association libraries in the New York state and local employees' retirement system.
LawCode: Add ยง31-g, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to participation by free association libraries in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
